channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The latest on the murder of right-wing activist Charlie Kirk
item.description: The person who shot and killed right-wing activist Charlie Kirk is still at large. On Thursday, officials shared photos and video of a suspect running...

item.title: Authorities arrest suspect in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk
item.description: The suspect has been identified as Tyler Robinson of Utah. Utah Gov. Spencer Cox said Robinson's family members reached out to a friend, who contacted...

item.title: South Africa reopens inquest into death of Steve Biko
item.description: South Africa has reopened the investigation into the death of anti-apartheid leader Steve Biko — 48 years after he was killed in police custody.

item.title: Memphis latest city Trump is targeting for federal government actions to combat crime
item.description: In an interview Friday morning, President Trump announced Memphis is his next target for federal intervention to combat crime. The president said he h...

item.title: In 2022, the name 'monkeypox' was rejected as inapt. Now the U.S. is reviving it
item.description: The World Health Organization nixed the name "monkeypox." The virus is spread by rodents and small mammals. And there's a stigma factor. Mpox took its...

item.title: Choose your America: In the aftermath of the Kirk slaying, a snapshot of a fractured nation
Japan sets record of nearly 100,000 people aged over 100
item.description: The number of Japanese centenarians rose to 99,763 in September, with women making up 88% of the total.

item.title: Suspect arrested in Charlie Kirk killing confessed to father, officials say
item.description: A person has been arrested in connection with the shooting that killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk, sources said.

item.title: South African rapist loses bid to block Netflix film about his life
item.description: Thabo Bester had argued the documentary would affect his trial for allegedly faking his death to escape prison.

item.title: Officials say Charlie Kirk shooting suspect arrested after he confessed to dad | Special Report
item.description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox, FBI Director Kash Patel and other officials announced the suspect in the assassination of Charlie Kirk was arrested on Thursday...

item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect is in custody. Here's what we know.
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot and killed on Wednesday while speaking an event at Utah Valley University.

item.title: Qatar prime minister meeting U.S. officials after Israeli attack on Hamas leaders in Doha
item.description: The prime minister of Qatar is in Washington, D.C. on Friday to discuss Tuesday's Israeli attack on Hamas leaders who were in Doha. CBS News' Imtiaz T...

item.title: Officials plead for help in finding Charlie Kirk’s shooter
item.description: Federal and state investigators are appealing for the public’s help in finding the person who assassinated conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: US joins UN Security Council condemnation of Israeli strikes on Qatar
item.description: The US traditionally blocks actions against its close ally Israel at the United Nations.

item.title: UK says 'great news' British national freed in Belarus release deal
item.description: Julia Fenner was given a long jail term after being detained while entering Belarus in March 2024.

item.title: Suspect in custody and named as Tyler Robinson - what we know so far
item.description: President Trump says "I think we've got him".

item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect in custody after manhunt, officials announce
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk died Wednesday after he was shot at an event at Utah Valley University. Officials say a suspect is now in custody.

item.title: Assassination of Charlie Kirk adds to America’s roll call of public violence
